edu.ncsu.csc216.incident_management.model.incident

Interface IncidentState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagedIncident.CanceledState, ManagedIncident.ClosedState, ManagedIncident.InProgressState, ManagedIncident.NewState, ManagedIncident.OnHoldState, ManagedIncident.ResolvedState

    public interface IncidentState
    Interface for states in the Incident Manager State Pattern. All concrete incident states must implement the IncidentState interface.
    Author:
    Dr. Sarah Heckman (sarah_heckman@ncsu.edu)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getStateName()
      Returns the name of the current state as a String.
      void updateState(Command command)
      Update the ManagedIncident based on the given Command.

    • Method Detail

      • updateState

        void updateState(Command command)
        Update the ManagedIncident based on the given Command. An UnsupportedOperationException is thrown if the CommandValue is not a valid action for the given state.
        Parameters:
        command - Command describing the action that will update the ManagedIncident's state.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if the CommandValue is not a valid action for the given state.

      • getStateName

        java.lang.String getStateName()
        Returns the name of the current state as a String.
        Returns:
        the name of the current state as a String.
